wellcome_subtitle: This is a simple auction project to play with vue.js
wellcome_text_01: As a buyer, you have to enter the maximum price you are willing to pay for a product, and as a seller, you have to enter the minimum price for which you are willing to sell the product.
wellcome_text_02: Finally, the app will show your the result in a simple popup.
